remarks: Any operation is distributive outside its domain, if the domain doesn't contain the empty set.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.)
statement:
ndmov.1 $e |- dom F = ( S X. S ) $.
ndmov.5 $e |- -. (/) e. S $.
ndmov.6 $e |- dom G = ( S X. S ) $.
ndmovdistr $p |- ( -. ( A e. S /\ B e. S /\ C e. S ) -> ( A G ( B F C ) ) = ( ( A G B ) F ( A G C ) ) ) $.
